content:
Hi @David Hay , do you have plans to support R4 on clinfhir? A beta version I could have a go at even?

I want to have a play with InsurancePlan, even with the current version is there a way to import its structure definition?
Hi Dion - I've not as yet - though shouldn't too hard. I'll put it on the list of things to do - feel free to ping me in a couple of weeks if I've not gotten back to you...
